column1: NGR is from the 1950s record and is near a reservoir just north of Nant-y-bwch. Altitudes match.
MIDAS src_id 10904 ends 1983 and has an NGR 140m SW and closer to the WW but at a lower altitude, did the guage move?
Note on record sussgests that some low rainfall days may have been missed because the number of rain days is low.
